languages.text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to all enemies in the area and removes all their stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. The targets have to pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty or suffer even more mental damage and the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 3 rounds. The effect is selected randomly. Note: if the main target occupies a single cell, that target is not affected by this ability. Special: the Undying Emperor inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} on each target for each stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} removed from that target.

traits.locale_text: Deals Mental Damage to all creatures except the caster in area and applies {g|f:b626505e8c944ca3ab68e4008fedce89}Fatigued{/g}, {g|f:bd0b478bdb014d4c9d5b6af8ac877283}Disturbed{/g} or {g|f:8f4a66a1c9674e2b9016f79cc73f58a6}Perplexed{/g} for 3 rounds. On a succesful WIL Save (-20), the amount of Mental Damage is reduced and no status effects are applied. Purges {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Bloodstained Ally{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Bloodstained Enemy{/g}. The caster is immune to this ability. Special: applies 1 stack of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Fading{/g} on the target for each stack purged.

The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to all enemies in the area and removes all their stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. The targets have to pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty or suffer even more mental damage and the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 3 rounds. The effect is selected randomly. Special: the Undying Emperor inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} on each of his targets for each stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} he removed from that target.

The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to all enemies in the area and removes all their stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. The targets have to pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty or suffer even more mental damage and the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 3 rounds. The effect is selected randomly. Special: the Undying Emperor inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} on each of his targets for each stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} he removed from that target.

The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to all enemies in the area and removes all their stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. The targets have to pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty or suffer even more mental damage and the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 3 rounds. The effect is selected randomly. Note: if the main target occupies a single cell, that target is not affected by this ability. Special: the Undying Emperor inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} on each target for each stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} removed from that target.

The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to all enemies in the area and removes all their stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. The targets have to pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty or suffer even more mental damage and the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 3 rounds. The effect is selected randomly. Note: if the main target occupies a single cell, that target is not affected by this ability. Special: the Undying Emperor inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} on each target for each stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} removed from that target.

languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава IV. Локация DeathCultTemple.
Белая фаза (Разум).
Наносит большой Mental урон всем существам в паттерне бублика 7х7 и на 3 раунда накладывает 3 стака Fatigued/Disturbed/Perplexed (WIL Save -20). При успешном спасброске наносит средний Mental урон. Большая дистанция применения. Может применить на себя. Снимает стаки Bloodsoaked со всех, по кому попал.
Особое свойство: Дополнительно накладывает до конца боя на цели в радиусе 1 стак Fading за каждый снятый 1 стак Bloodsoaked.

languages.text: Неумирающий император наносит психический урон всем целям в области действия и снимает с них все уровни {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} и {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}. Цели совершают проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −20 и в случае провала получают еще больше психического урона, а также {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожность{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g} на 3 раунда. Эффект выбирается случайным образом. Важно: если основная цель способности занимает 1 клетку, эта способность на нее не действует. Особое свойство: Неумирающий Император накладывает на каждую цель +1 уровень {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}угасающего духа{/g} за каждый уровень {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} или {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}, снятый с этой цели.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to all enemies in the area and removes all their stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. The targets have to pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty or suffer even more mental damage and the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 3 rounds. The effect is selected randomly. Note: if the main target occupies a single cell, that target is not affected by this ability. Special: the Undying Emperor inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} on each target for each stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} removed from that target.

traits.locale_text: Неумирающий император наносит психический урон всем целям в области действия и снимает с них все уровни {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} и {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}. Цели совершают проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −20 и в случае провала получают еще больше психического урона, а также {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожность{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g} на 3 раунда. Эффект выбирается случайным образом. Важно: если основная цель способности занимает 1 клетку, эта способность на нее не действует. Особое свойство: Неумирающий Император накладывает на каждую цель +1 уровень {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}угасающего духа{/g} за каждый уровень {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} или {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}, снятый с этой цели.

Неумирающий император наносит психический урон всем целям в области действия и снимает с них все уровни {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} и {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}. Цели совершают проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −20 и в случае провала получают еще больше психического урона, а также {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожность{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g} на 3 раунда. Эффект выбирается случайным образом. Важно: если основная цель способности занимает 1 клетку, эта способность на нее не действует. Особое свойство: Неумирающий Император накладывает на каждую цель +1 уровень {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}угасающего духа{/g} за каждый уровень {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} или {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}, снятый с этой цели.

languages.text: El Emperador Inmortal inflige daño mental a todos los enemigos que haya en la zona y elimina todas sus acumulaciones de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g} y {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g}. Los objetivos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una penalización de −20 o sufrirán aún más daño mental y el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g} durante 3 asaltos. El efecto se determina al azar. Atención: si el objetivo principal ocupa una sola casilla, no se verá afectado por esta capacidad. Especial: el Emperador Inmortal inflige +1 acumulación de {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}alma evanescente{/g} a cada objetivo por cada acumulación de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g} o {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g} que se elimine de ese objetivo.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to all enemies in the area and removes all their stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. The targets have to pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty or suffer even more mental damage and the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 3 rounds. The effect is selected randomly. Note: if the main target occupies a single cell, that target is not affected by this ability. Special: the Undying Emperor inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} on each target for each stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} removed from that target.

traits.locale_text: El Emperador Inmortal inflige daño mental a todos los enemigos que haya en la zona y elimina todas sus acumulaciones de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g} y {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g}. Los objetivos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una penalización de −20 o sufrirán aún más daño mental y el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g} durante 3 asaltos. El efecto se determina al azar. Atención: si el objetivo principal ocupa una sola casilla, no se verá afectado por esta capacidad. Especial: el Emperador Inmortal inflige +1 acumulación de {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}alma evanescente{/g} a cada objetivo por cada acumulación de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g} o {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g} que se elimine de ese objetivo.

languages.text: 不死の皇帝は範囲内のすべての敵に精神ダメージを与え、{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}と{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}のスタックをすべて取り除く。対象は-20ペナルティの意志力抵抗判定に合格しなければ、さらに精神的ダメージを受け、3ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}当惑{/g}の効果を受ける。効果はランダムに選ばれる。 メモ：メイン・ターゲットが1マスにいる場合、そのターゲットはこの能力の影響を受けない。 特別：不死の皇帝は各対象から{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}または{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}が1スタック取り除かれるごとに、各対象に+1スタックの{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}消える魂{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to all enemies in the area and removes all their stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. The targets have to pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty or suffer even more mental damage and the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 3 rounds. The effect is selected randomly. Note: if the main target occupies a single cell, that target is not affected by this ability. Special: the Undying Emperor inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} on each target for each stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} removed from that target.

traits.locale_text: 不死の皇帝は範囲内のすべての敵に精神ダメージを与え、{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}と{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}のスタックをすべて取り除く。対象は-20ペナルティの意志力抵抗判定に合格しなければ、さらに精神的ダメージを受け、3ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}当惑{/g}の効果を受ける。効果はランダムに選ばれる。 メモ：メイン・ターゲットが1マスにいる場合、そのターゲットはこの能力の影響を受けない。 特別：不死の皇帝は各対象から{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}または{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}が1スタック取り除かれるごとに、各対象に+1スタックの{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}消える魂{/g}を与える。

languages.text: 不死神皇对目标区域内所有敌人造成精神伤害，同时移除目标身上所有{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}与{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}层数。受影响的目标需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-20减值。未能通过检定的目标会承受额外精神伤害，且会随机受到{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果影响，持续三轮。 注意：如果此能力的主要目标仅占用1个格子，则该目标不会受到此能力的影响。 特殊效果：不死神皇每从目标身上移除1层{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}或{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果，就会对目标施加1层{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}灵魂凋零{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to all enemies in the area and removes all their stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. The targets have to pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty or suffer even more mental damage and the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 3 rounds. The effect is selected randomly. Note: if the main target occupies a single cell, that target is not affected by this ability. Special: the Undying Emperor inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} on each target for each stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} removed from that target.

traits.locale_text: 不死神皇对目标区域内所有敌人造成精神伤害，同时移除目标身上所有{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}与{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}层数。受影响的目标需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-20减值。未能通过检定的目标会承受额外精神伤害，且会随机受到{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果影响，持续三轮。 注意：如果此能力的主要目标仅占用1个格子，则该目标不会受到此能力的影响。 特殊效果：不死神皇每从目标身上移除1层{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}或{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果，就会对目标施加1层{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}灵魂凋零{/g}效果。

languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to all enemies in the area and removes all their stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. The targets have to pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty or suffer even more mental damage and the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 3 rounds. The effect is selected randomly. Note: if the main target occupies a single cell, that target is not affected by this ability. Special: the Undying Emperor inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} on each target for each stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} removed from that target.

languages.text: L'Empereur Immortel inflige des dégâts mentaux à tous les ennemis dans la zone et dissipe tous leurs cumuls de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} et {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}. Les cibles doivent réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale avec une pénalité de −20. En cas d'échec, elles subissent encore plus de dégâts mentaux, ainsi que l'un des effets aléatoires suivants pendant 3 rounds : {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}. Remarque : si la cible principale occupe une seule case, elle n'est pas affectée par cette capacité. Spécial : l'Empereur Immortel inflige à chaque cible +1 cumul d'{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Âme affaiblie{/g} par cumul de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} ou {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g} dissipé sur cette cible.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to all enemies in the area and removes all their stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. The targets have to pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty or suffer even more mental damage and the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 3 rounds. The effect is selected randomly. Note: if the main target occupies a single cell, that target is not affected by this ability. Special: the Undying Emperor inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} on each target for each stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} removed from that target.

traits.locale_text: L'Empereur Immortel inflige des dégâts mentaux à tous les ennemis dans la zone et dissipe tous leurs cumuls de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} et {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}. Les cibles doivent réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale avec une pénalité de −20. En cas d'échec, elles subissent encore plus de dégâts mentaux, ainsi que l'un des effets aléatoires suivants pendant 3 rounds : {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}. Remarque : si la cible principale occupe une seule case, elle n'est pas affectée par cette capacité. Spécial : l'Empereur Immortel inflige à chaque cible +1 cumul d'{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Âme affaiblie{/g} par cumul de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} ou {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g} dissipé sur cette cible.

L'Empereur Immortel inflige des dégâts mentaux à tous les ennemis dans la zone et dissipe tous leurs cumuls de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} et {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}. Les cibles doivent réussir un test de résistance de Volonté avec une pénalité de -20. En cas d'échec, elles subissent encore plus de dégâts mentaux, ainsi que l'un des effets aléatoires suivants pendant 3 rounds : {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}. Remarque : si la cible principale occupe une seule case, elle n'est pas affectée par cette capacité. Spécial : l'Empereur Immortel inflige à chaque cible +1 cumul d'{g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}Âme affaiblie{/g} par cumul de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} ou {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g} dissipé sur cette cible.

languages.text: Ölmeyen İmparator, alandaki tüm düşmanlara zihinsel hasar verir ve üzerlerindeki tüm {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}kanla vaftiz{/g} ve {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}kan yarası{/g} birikimlerini kaldırır. Hedefler, −20 ceza puanına sahip bir İrade direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde daha da fazla zihinsel hasar alır ve 3 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}yorgunluk{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}kaygı{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} etkilerine maruz kalırlar. Etki, rastgele seçilir. Not: Ana hedef, tek hücrelik yer kaplıyorsa bu kabiliyetten etkilenmez. Özel: Ölmeyen İmparator, hedeflerden kaldırdığı her {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}kanla vaftiz{/g} veya {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}kan yarası{/g} birikimi için onlarda +1 {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}solan ruh{/g} birikimine sebep olur.
languages.original_text: The Undying Emperor deals mental damage to all enemies in the area and removes all their stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g}. The targets have to pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty or suffer even more mental damage and the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 3 rounds. The effect is selected randomly. Note: if the main target occupies a single cell, that target is not affected by this ability. Special: the Undying Emperor inflicts +1 stack of {g|f:26bad8fff4f24e6b8558340eb509c6cf}fading soul{/g} on each target for each stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} removed from that target.
